Package CCDD

Class CcddDbControlHandler

java.lang.Object
CCDD.CcddDbControlHandler
public class CcddDbControlHandler extends Object
CFS Command and Data Dictionary database control handler class

    • setEventLog

      protected void setEventLog()
      Create a reference to the session event log. This can't be done initially since the event log hasn't been created when this class is instantiated

      Returns:

    • convertProjectNameToDatabase

      protected String convertProjectNameToDatabase(String projectName)
      Convert the specified project name into its equivalent PostgreSQL database name. All upper case letters are set to lower case. Non-alphanumeric characters are replaced with underscores(_), and an underscore is prepended if the name begins with a numeral. The database name is truncated if necessary to the maximum length allowed by PostgreSQL
      Parameters:
      projectName - Project name
      Returns:
      The specified project name converted to its equivalent PostgreSQL database name

      private void setAccessLevel()

      protected String getQuotedName(String name)
      Force the supplied table or column name to lower case. Bound the name with double quotes if it matches a PostgreSQL reserved word
      Parameters:
      name - Table or column name
      Returns:
      Supplied table or column name in lower case, bounded with double quotes if it matches a PostgreSQL reserved word (case insensitive)

    • getDatabaseComment

      protected String[] getDatabaseComment(String databaseName)
      Get the array containing the database comment fields (without the CFS project identifier)
      Parameters:
      databaseName - Database name
      Returns:
      Array containing the database comment in the format <lock status (0 or 1)>,<visible project database name (with capitalization and special characters intact)>,<project description>; null if the comment cannot be retrieved

    • parseDatabaseComment

      protected String[] parseDatabaseComment(String databaseName, String comment)
      Parse the supplied database comment string into an array of the comment's separate fields
      Parameters:
      databaseName - Database name
      comment - Database comment
      Returns:
      Array containing the database comment in the format <lock status (0 or 1)>,<visible project database name (with capitalization and special characters intact)>,<project description>; null if the comment cannot be retrieved

    • getDatabaseLockStatus

      protected Boolean getDatabaseLockStatus(String databaseName)
      Get the database lock status
      Parameters:
      databaseName - Database name
      Returns:
      True if the database is locked, false if not locked, or null if the comment cannot be retrieved

      protected void setDatabaseLockStatus(String projectName, boolean lockStatus)
      Set the database lock status. If the GUI is hidden the lock status is unchanged
      Parameters:
      projectName - Project name
      lockStatus - True if the database is locked; false if unlocked

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • buildDatabaseCommentCommandAndUpdateInternalTable

      protected String buildDatabaseCommentCommandAndUpdateInternalTable(String projectName, String administrator, boolean lockStatus, String description)
      Build the command to create the database comment and update the internal table _dbu_info. Delimit the text so that special characters (e.g., single quotes) can be placed in the description
      Parameters:
      projectName - Project name (with case and special characters preserved)
      administrator - Name of the user(s) with administrative access to the project database
      lockStatus - True if the database is locked; false if unlocked
      description - Database description
      Returns:
      Command to create the database comment

    • buildOwnerCommand

      protected String buildOwnerCommand(CcddConstants.DatabaseObject object, String objectName)
      Build the command to change a database object's owner and grant access privileges to the currently active database owner
      Parameters:
      object - DatabaseObjects (DATABASE, TABLE, or FUNCTION)
      objectName - Name of the database object to alter
      Returns:
      Command to change a database object's owner and grant access privileges to the current group

    • buildOwnerCommand

      private String buildOwnerCommand(String ownerName, CcddConstants.DatabaseObject object, String objectName)
      Build the command to change a database object's owner and grant access privileges to the specified database owner
      Parameters:
      ownerName - Name of the role or user that owns the database and its objects
      object - DatabaseObjects (DATABASE, TABLE, or FUNCTION)
      objectName - Name of the database object to alter
      Returns:
      Command to change a database object's owner and grant access privileges to the specified group

    • resetAutoCommit

      private void resetAutoCommit()
      Disable the database change auto-commit mode

    • createDatabase

      protected boolean createDatabase(String projectName, String ownerName, String administrator, String description)
      Create a project database
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to create, with case and special characters preserved
      ownerName - Name of the role or user that owns the database and its objects
      administrator - Project administrator name(s) (comma-separated)
      description - Database description
      Returns:
      True if the command completes successfully; false otherwise

    • createDatabaseInBackground

      protected void createDatabaseInBackground(String projectName, String ownerName, String administrator, String description)
      Create a project database. This command is executed in a separate thread since it can take a noticeable amount time to complete, and by using a separate thread the GUI is allowed to continue to update. The GUI menu commands, however, are disabled until the database command completes execution
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to create, with case preserved
      ownerName - Name of the role or user that owns the database and its objects
      administrator - Project administrator name(s) (comma-separated)
      description - Database description

    • createTablesAndFunctions

      private boolean createTablesAndFunctions()
      Create the reusable database functions and default tables. This does not include the default column functions
      Returns:
      True if an error occurs creating the database functions or tables

    • createTemporaryTable

      private void createTemporaryTable() throws SQLException
      Create a temporary table for storing the results returned by the database functions
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs when creating the temporary table

    • createStructureColumnFunctions

      protected boolean createStructureColumnFunctions()
      Create the reusable database functions for obtaining structure table members and structure-defining column values
      Returns:
      True if an error occurs creating the structure functions

    • deleteFunction

      private String deleteFunction(String functionName)
      Build the command to delete a database function. This deletes the function whether or not the input parameters match
      Parameters:
      functionName - Name of the function to delete
      Returns:
      Command to delete the specified database function

    • buildInformationTableCommand

      protected String buildInformationTableCommand(CcddConstants.InternalTable intTable)
      Build the command to create an internal table
      Parameters:
      intTable - Type of internal table to build
      Returns:
      Command to build the specified internal table

    • authenticateUser

      protected boolean authenticateUser(String userName, String password)
      Authenticate the specified user credentials for the PostgreSQL server and the currently open database
      Parameters:
      userName - User name
      password - User password
      Returns:
      True if the user is allowed access to the currently open database

    • connectToServer

      protected boolean connectToServer()
      Connect to the server (default database)
      Returns:
      True if the connection attempt failed

    • connectToDatabase

      protected boolean connectToDatabase(String projectName, String databaseName, boolean isReconnect)
      Connect to a database
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to open
      databaseName - Name of the database to open
      isReconnect - True if this is an attempt to reconnect to the database following a failed transaction
      Returns:
      True if the connection attempt failed

    • reconnectToDatabase

      protected boolean reconnectToDatabase()
      Reconnect to the active database
      Returns:
      True if the connection attempt failed

    • openDatabase

      protected boolean openDatabase(String projectName)
      Open a database. Create the database functions
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to open
      Returns:
      True if an error occurred opening the database; false if the database successfully opened

    • openDatabase

      protected boolean openDatabase(String projectName, boolean createFunctions)
      Open a database using the current host, port, and SSL settings
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to open
      createFunctions - True to create the database functions; false if reopening a database (so the functions already exist)
      Returns:
      True if an error occurred opening the database; false if the database successfully opened

    • openDatabase

      protected boolean openDatabase(String projectName, boolean createFunctions, boolean addDefaultDataTypes)
      Open a database using the current host, port, and SSL settings
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to open
      createFunctions - True to create the database functions; false if reopening a database (so the functions already exist)
      addDefaultDataTypes - True if the default data types should be added to the database. This is normally false only when restoring a database from JSON or CSV
      Returns:
      True if an error occurred opening the database; false if the database successfully opened

    • openDatabase

      protected boolean openDatabase(String projectName, String serverHost, String serverPort, boolean isSSL, boolean createFunctions)
      Open a database using the project name, host, port, and SSL settings provided
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to open
      serverHost - PostgreSQL server host
      serverPort - PostgreSQL server port
      isSSL - True if an SSL connection is enabled
      createFunctions - True to create the database functions; false if reopening a database (so the functions already exist)
      Returns:
      True if an error occurred opening the database; false if the database successfully opened

    • openDatabaseInBackground

      protected void openDatabaseInBackground(String projectName)
      Open a database using the current host, port, and SSL settings provided. This command is executed in a separate thread since it can take a noticeable amount time to complete, and by using a separate thread the GUI is allowed to continue to update. The GUI menu commands, however, are disabled until the database command completes execution
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to open

    • openDatabaseInBackground

      protected void openDatabaseInBackground(String projectName, String serverHost, String serverPort, boolean isSSL)
      Open a database using the host, port, and SSL settings provided. This command is executed in a separate thread since it can take a noticeable amount time to complete, and by using a separate thread the GUI is allowed to continue to update. The GUI menu commands, however, are disabled until the database command completes execution
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to open
      serverHost - PostgreSQL server host
      serverPort - PostgreSQL server port
      isSSL - True if an SSL connection is enabled

      Parameters:
      targetProject - Name of the project to copy
      copyProject - Name of the project copy

    • backupDatabaseInBackground

      protected void backupDatabaseInBackground(String projectName, CcddClassesComponent.FileEnvVar backupFile)
      Backup a project database. This command is executed in a separate thread since it can take a noticeable amount time to complete, and by using a separate thread the GUI is allowed to continue to update. The GUI menu commands, however, are disabled until the database command completes execution
      Parameters:
      projectName - Project name
      backupFile - File to which to backup the database

      Backup a project database
      Parameters:
      projectName - Project name
      backupFile - File to which to backup the database
      Returns:
      True if an the database could not be backed up

    • restoreDatabaseInBackground

      protected void restoreDatabaseInBackground(String projectName, String ownerName, String administrator, String description, File restoreFile, boolean overwriteExisting)
      Restore a database. This command is executed in a separate thread since it can take a noticeable amount time to complete, and by using a separate thread the GUI is allowed to continue to update. The GUI menu commands, however, are disabled until the database command completes execution
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to restore (preserving case and special characters)
      ownerName - Name of the role or user that owns the database and its objects
      administrator - Project administrator name(s) (comma-separated)
      description - Project description
      restoreFile - File to restore the database from
      overwriteExisting - True to overwrite the existing project database; false to create a new database ion which to restore the backup file contents

    • restoreDatabase

      protected void restoreDatabase(String projectName, String ownerName, String administrator, String description, File restoreFile, boolean overwriteExisting)
      Restore a database
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to restore (preserving case and special characters)
      ownerName - Name of the role or user that owns the database and its objects
      administrator - Project administrator name(s) (comma-separated)
      description - Project description
      restoreFile - File to restore the database from
      overwriteExisting - True to overwrite the existing project database; false to create a new database ion which to restore the backup file contents

    • getRestoreNames

      protected String[] getRestoreNames(String projectName, boolean overwriteExisting)
      Get the project and database names when restoring a database. If overwriteExisting is false then check if the server already has a database matching the project name. If so, indicate that this is a restored database and, if needed, amend the name so that it is unique
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to restore (preserving case and special characters)
      overwriteExisting - True to overwrite the existing project database; false to create a new database ion which to restore the backup file contents

    • executeProcess

      protected String executeProcess(String command, int numArgs)
      Execute an operating system command
      Parameters:
      command - Command to process
      numArgs - Number of arguments in the command
      Returns:
      Error message text if an error occurs; empty string is the command completed successfully
